actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to reduce the level of Federal employment to the level which existed on July 1, 1975.

summary.text: States that effective July 1, 1977, the number of civil service employees in each Federal agency may not exceed the number so employed by such agency on July 1, 1975. Requires the Civil Service Commission to promulgate rules to carry out the requirement of this Act and to report to Congress by the fourth week in April, 1977, regarding the means and extent by which the level of Federal employment has been reduced under this Act.

titles.title: A bill to reduce the level of Federal employment to the level which existed on July 1, 1975.
